name: Nuggie Collector
description:
Nuggie collector
Beat the enemies and collect the nuggies!
But be careful. The enemies may explode after you defeat them.

Fullscreen button is on the right bottom corner.
If game controls doesn't work after entering fullscreen, click the game window to refocus.
Press Esc to exit fullscreen mode.

Controls:
A/D  - Left/Right
W     - Jump
1-3   - Select Weapon
P      - Pause
E      - Interact

Mouse     - Aim
Left Click - Shoot
